price: 52. Zeg: “Vertel mij of het (de Koran)van Allah afkomstig is of jullie daar niet in geloven – wie dwaalt er meer dan degene die er ver vandaan is (de Koran)."
arabic: قُلۡ أَرَءَيۡتُمۡ إِن كَانَ مِنۡ عِندِ ٱللَّهِ ثُمَّ كَفَرۡتُم بِهِۦ مَنۡ أَضَلُّ مِمَّنۡ هُوَ فِي شِقَاقِۭ بَعِيدٖ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: qul ara-aytum in kāna min ʿindi al-lahi thumma kafartum bihi man aḍallu mimman huwa fī shiqāqin baʿīdin
